generate

Class RandomGraphGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • generate.RandomGraphGenerator

  • public class RandomGraphGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    class to generate random graphs given the range of graph sizes, number of graphs to be generated and density steps
    Author:
    Chigozie Ekwonu

        makes multiple graphs for a given graph size and density
        Parameters:
        v - the graph size
        p - the density or edge probability
        no - the number of graphs to be generated per graph size and density
